emuInput.TitMainTitle: Mrs. Berry wearing large corsage, unknown man, and Edwin C. "Bill" Berry seated behind dining table with bread rolls in Centre Avenue YMCA
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 21, 1945, pg. 15, reads: "Farewell to Friends - Mr. and Mrs. Edwin C. (Bill) Berry left the city last week-end for their new home in Portland, Ore. where he has accepted the position of executive secretary of the Urban League. Berry served as community organization secretary of the local Urban League. - Courier Photo by Harris."
